edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_4

Class Disease

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_4.Disease
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Disease
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Disease conatains the diseases that the animals might have. It has a disease name, and the status of that disease.
    Author:
    David Scianni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This is the name of the disease.

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        This is the default serial ID for the Disease object.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • illness

        private String illness
        This is the name of the disease.

      • status

        private boolean status
        This will keep track of the status. If its true, then the disease is current, but if it is false, then it is a past disease.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Disease

        public Disease(String i,
       boolean s)
        This constructor sets up the disease name and the status of that disease.
        Parameters:
        i - The disease name.
        s - The status of the disease.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public boolean getStatus()
        This will get the status of the disease, as a boolean
        Returns:
        status, true for current, and false for past

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(boolean status)
        We can use this to change the status of a disease, if that disease goes away or comes back
        Parameters:
        status - The boolean that determines the new status

      • getIllness

        public String getIllness()
        This method will return the name of the disease.
        Returns:
        illness, which is the name of the disease.
